short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stackoverflow.com extension - possible answerers will be added to questions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to a new stackoverflow!

Many questions are left unanswered or don't have good answers.
sofy chrome extension will suggest users in the community appropriate to answer your questions.
